name: Idle Lemonade Tycoon Empire
summary: Have you ever dreamed to be a rich lemonade business tycoon and sell juicy drinks at your own lemonade stand? Play the world’s best idle tycoon simulator game, farm lemons, blend lemonade to get a lemonade factory tycoon and an idle hero. Challenge accepted?
